body_html:
@andrewharp I am definitely not knowledgeable enough to help with cmake stuff but I might give the gradle bits a go if I find some time in the next week or so. When/If I have a go I will add it my currently open Pull Request (or make a new one) and we can continue the conversation there.

Thanks for your help with this particular issue and android in general. I'm still struggling to understand how most of it works so I appreciate having this communication. Source code is hard when you didn't write it :(

Thanks!
